title: Rechargeable torch with emergency light and nighlight

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for rechargeable torch with emergency light and nightlight, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front elevational view of a rechargeable torch with emergency light and nightlight in accordance with my invention thereof;
FIG. 2 is a rear elevational view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a left side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a right side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a top elevational view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a bottom elevational view thereof;
FIG. 7 is a front perspective view thereof:
FIG. 8 is a front exploded perspective view of the torch and charging cradle thereof; and,
FIG. 9 is a rear exploded perspective view of the torch and charging cradle of a rechargeable torch with emergency light and nightlight.
